ygData.subject: Re: stuck on luclin quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you Hanna, Tracy and Bebbinn. Cant belive now how stupid I was, had a whole stash of those leaves banked away incase i needed them? for some reason had
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you Hanna, Tracy and Bebbinn.

Cant belive now how stupid I was, had a whole stash of those leaves
banked away incase i needed them? for some reason had it in my head
the leaves were a ground spawn not a drop so never even gave them a
thought, DuH.And like Bebinn I am also enjoying all the quests .Cant
move on my computer desks for all these bits of paper with scrawled
notes on pottery , owl feathers and names and locs :0) I am Newcomer
to Everquest just started playing at the start of December and was
addicted the first day, and bought Luclin a few weeks ago and i am
happily frolicing round with my wee singing cat though sadly my barb
shaman is gathering dust.

Thanks again all for the help :0)
Purrgara ....who cant see the tea for the leaves!!
